summary: Professional website for Ethos Towing & Recovery INC, a towing and recovery company based in Fresno, California, offering services within 200-400 miles radius, operated by an experienced team, featuring a professional, modern, authoritative design with full authority emphasis and easy navigation. Contact form submissions are stored in the backend canister and can be accessed manually or through an admin panel. Website includes an integrated chatbot for customer interaction, displays jump start services (integrated with vehicle recovery), and features an 'ETR Everyday' subscription membership program priced at $110 offering 24/7 roadside assistance, mobile battery service, flat tire service, emergency fuel delivery, lockout services, member discounts, and expert automotive advice.
architectural_notes: Website type: Professional service business website for towing company
Target audience: Customers needing towing services in Fresno, CA area
Color scheme: Red, white, and blue as primary colors
Design emphasis: Full authority, professional, modern aesthetic
Navigation: Easy, intuitive user experience is primary goal
Chatbot integration: Will need to add customer interaction chat functionality to the website
Subscription model: ETR Everyday membership at $110 with seven core benefits
Membership benefits: 24/7 roadside assistance, mobile battery service, flat tire service, emergency fuel delivery, lockout services, member discounts, and expert automotive advice

Create an 'About Us' or 'Our Team' section highlighting the experienced team and company credentials
Display prominent contact information including phone number and email for emergency towing requests
